doc:
Jimmy Bridges (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Bridges_(actor) 0 James Daniel Bridges Jr. (born September 15, 1960 in San Francisco, California) is an American actor. He is the son of Betty A. Bridges, an actress, and James Bridges Sr. and the brother of Todd Bridges of Diff'rent Strokes and Verda Bridges. His three daughters, Penny Bae Bridges, Brooke Marie Bridges, and Rachel Bridges are all actresses. Had tryouts with the LA Rams and Detroit Lions in the early 80’s. James_Daniel_Bridges_Jr. ( born September_15_,_1960 in San_Francisco , California ) is an_American_actor . He is the_son of Betty_A._Bridges , an_actress , and James_Bridges_Sr. and the_brother of Todd_Bridges of Diff'rent_Strokes and Verda_Bridges . His_three_daughters , Penny_Bae_Bridges , Brooke_Marie_Bridges , and Rachel_Bridges are all_actresses . Had tryouts with the_LA_Rams_and_Detroit_Lions in the_early_80 ’s .
